FuncDef: This command displays queue group pool information.

ParaDef.Info: Displays the pool information of the specified XMA or MDA.
Displays the pool information of the specified QoS policy. Values-access-ingress, access-egress.
Displays pool information for the specified service. Values-1 to 2147483647.
Display information for the specified queue group.
Specifies to display information for the ingress or egress direction. Values-ingress, egress.
Specifies the identification of a specific instance of the queue-group. Values-1 to 65535.
